meanings.definition: To the highest degree or extent
meanings.sent1: She maximally exerted herself during the race.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to maximally complete his tasks.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel maximally gathered nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The sun maximally shines during the summer months.
meanings.sent5: The student maximally studied for the important exam.

meanings.definition: In a way that is most effective or efficient
meanings.sent1: She maximally organized her schedule for productivity.
meanings.sent2: He works maximally to achieve his goals.
meanings.sent3: The chef maximally seasoned the dish for flavor.
meanings.sent4: The athlete maximally trained for the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent5: The team maximally collaborated to complete the project on time.
